title: Idle Vault Cleanup
description: As the system, I want to stop idle vault repo processes so that server resources are conserved.
acceptance_criteria: Repo process stops after 30 minutes of inactivity
No data loss on repo restart

abandoned_cleanup.eligibility: No activity for 90 days AND no recovery email
abandoned_cleanup.warning: Send email 7 days before deletion if email configured
abandoned_cleanup.retention: Keep central DB record with deleted_at for 30 days
